name: Tanya
subtitle: The Silencing Blade
description: An elite assassin of the Laughing Masks, and a former colleague of Roi. In the past, she was a 'cleaner' that hunted down traitors. Her sharp katars never miss their mark.
story: An assassin of the Laughing Mask, and Roi's colleague. Although she has a physical advantage over Roi as a Half-Elf, she lacks his worldly wisdom and his ability to connect with others, traits that made him crucial in large-scale operations. This has given her something of an inferiority complex. As the 'Cleaner' of the organization, she was tasked with eliminating any traitors. When Roi abandoned the organization, she set out to chase him to figure out his motivation, leaving all her other tasks behind. Her plans after finding him remain to be seen.

talk: ...Do not attempt to converse with a woman who knows nothing but killing.
I refuse to work as a janitor...
Sorry... I am not the talkative type.
No fun would come of talking to a person like me...
Why are you interested in someone like me...? I do not understand...

uw.story: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.
